solution_line_template: There were {guppies_initial} + {angelfish_initial} + {tiger_sharks_initial} + {oscar_fish_initial} = <<{guppies_initial}+{angelfish_initial}+{tiger_sharks_initial}+{oscar_fish_initial}={total_initial_fish}>>{total_initial_fish} fishes in the tank.

The fish to be sold is {guppies_sold} + {angelfish_sold} + {tiger_sharks_sold} + {oscar_fish_sold} = <<{guppies_sold}+{angelfish_sold}+{tiger_sharks_sold}+{oscar_fish_sold}={total_fish_sold}>>{total_fish_sold}.
Therefore, Danny will be left with {total_initial_fish} - {total_fish_sold} = <<{total_initial_fish}-{total_fish_sold}={remaining_fish}>>{remaining_fish} fishes.
